mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "LECTURE" ("LCTR_ID", "USER_SEQ", "ONOFF","LCTR_CATEGORY","LCTR_NAME", "LCTR_COUNT","RCRT_DATE", "LCTR_COST", "LCTR_STATE", "EVAL_CRITERIA", "LCTR_START_DATE", "LCTR_CNTSCHD", "FILE_GROUP", "LCTR_SCHD") values (NEXTVAL('lctr_id_seq'), #{user_seq},CAST (#{onoff} AS INTEGER),CAST (#{lctr_category} AS INTEGER),#{lctr_name},#{lctr_count},#{rcrt_date},#{lctr_cost},'4001',#{eval_criteria},#{lctr_start_date},#{lctr_cntschd},#{file_group},#{lctr_schd})
mapper.select: SELECT l."LCTR_ID", user_info_name."USER_NAME" AS "user_name", comm_onoff."CD_NM" AS "onoff_tr", comm_category."CD_NM" AS "lctr_category", l."LCTR_NAME", l."LCTR_COUNT", l."RCRT_DATE", l."LCTR_COST", comm_state."CD_NM" AS "lctr_state", l."EVAL_CRITERIA", l."LCTR_START_DATE", l."LCTR_CNTSCHD", l."FILE_GROUP", l."LCTR_SCHD" FROM "LECTURE" l LEFT JOIN "COMM" comm_onoff ON l."ONOFF" = comm_onoff."CD" LEFT JOIN "COMM" comm_category ON l."LCTR_CATEGORY" = comm_category."CD" LEFT JOIN "COMM" comm_state ON l."LCTR_STATE" = comm_state."CD" LEFT JOIN "USER_INFO" user_info_name ON l."USER_SEQ" = user_info_name."USER_SEQ";

SELECT l."LCTR_ID", user_info_name."USER_NAME" AS "user_name", comm_onoff."CD_NM" AS "onoff_tr", comm_category."CD_NM" AS "lctr_category", l."LCTR_NAME", l."LCTR_COUNT", l."RCRT_DATE", l."LCTR_COST", comm_state."CD_NM" AS "lctr_state", l."EVAL_CRITERIA", l."LCTR_START_DATE", l."LCTR_CNTSCHD", l."FILE_GROUP", l."LCTR_SCHD", l."REGISTER_COUNT" FROM "LECTURE" l LEFT JOIN "COMM" comm_onoff ON l."ONOFF" = comm_onoff."CD" LEFT JOIN "COMM" comm_category ON l."LCTR_CATEGORY" = comm_category."CD" LEFT JOIN "COMM" comm_state ON l."LCTR_STATE" = comm_state."CD" LEFT JOIN "USER_INFO" user_info_name ON l."USER_SEQ" = user_info_name."USER_SEQ" WHERE l."LCTR_STATE" = '4003';

SELECT l."LCTR_ID", user_info_name."USER_NAME" AS "user_name", comm_onoff."CD_NM" AS "onoff_tr", comm_category."CD_NM" AS "lctr_category", l."LCTR_NAME", l."LCTR_COUNT", l."RCRT_DATE", l."LCTR_COST", comm_state."CD_NM" AS "lctr_state", l."EVAL_CRITERIA", l."LCTR_START_DATE", l."LCTR_CNTSCHD", l."FILE_GROUP", l."LCTR_SCHD" FROM "LECTURE" l LEFT JOIN "COMM" comm_onoff ON l."ONOFF" = comm_onoff."CD" LEFT JOIN "COMM" comm_category ON l."LCTR_CATEGORY" = comm_category."CD" LEFT JOIN "COMM" comm_state ON l."LCTR_STATE" = comm_state."CD" LEFT JOIN "USER_INFO" user_info_name ON l."USER_SEQ" = user_info_name."USER_SEQ" WHERE l."LCTR_ID" = #{lctr_id} ;
